snippet: Some items included in the Hurricane Sandy aid package were unrelated to the storm, but supporters say many of the appropriations are necessary to respond to disasters.
lead_paragraph: Some items included in the Hurricane Sandy aid package were unrelated to the storm, but supporters say many of the appropriations are necessary to respond to disasters.

headline.main: Expenditures for a Hurricane, and Beyond
headline.print_headline: Expenditures for a Hurricane, and Beyond
